DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to undertake an initial evaluation of the safety, tolerability, antiviral effect, and pharmacokinetics of celgosivir in combination with peginterferon alfa-2b and ribavirin in patients with chronic HCV infection.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Safety, Antiviral Effect, and Pharmacokinetics of Celgosivir in Combination With Peginterferon Alfa-2b and Ribavirin in Treatment-Naïve Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C
DOC.criteria: 1865 years of age, inclusive primary diagnosis of chronic HCV infection, genotype 1 Interferonbased treatmentnaïve Body Mass Index of 18 to 30, inclusive patients previously treated with Interferonbased therapy patients with diabetes mellitus
